text:
Hi Support Team!
I have an issue with this <https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/lists/3/add> API. In the attached SS you can see my request payload and the error.
My end goal is I need to upload my users email to HubSpot so I can send them marketing emails.

Hi Team,
I am facing an issue while to try to add contact to the list. I am using Add API (<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/lists/xxx/memberships/add>) to add contact to the list. It returns empty 200 response and sometimes return JSON Object.
```{"recordsIdsAdded":[263172784]}```
But contact not added to the List. Any suggestion?

Sorry Daniel - this new lists API is still in beta, so feel free to use the contacts API in tandem if there is functionality that you need which this new API does not provide. Long term, this new lists API will replace the old contacts list API

Hi Jilani - how are you verifying that no contact was added to the list? Are you fetching memberships from the membership fetch endpoint and not seeing it there?

Regarding the empty 200 response, this most likely is because the records you are trying to add already belong to the list
Hello! Given this is about the existing V1 API and not the V3 beta API that this channel is for, could you please log a customer support ticket via chat?
